title: Unable to connect to the login queue
body: I just updated my client this morning. Now when I tried to log in, a message saying "Unable to connect to the login queue" showed up. Does anybody have the same problem? My internet is working fine and there seems to be no problem with the North America server.

replies.body: Thanks for the reports guys.  The issues causing this overnight should now be resolved!

several hours ( like 7hours ) can't connect to the game due to an error message "unable to acces to the login queue" 

that is really annoying... go Riot, repair it !
My friend from Japan can't log in for several hours. any idea when this will be fixed?
I could log in yesterday after the patch but today i just suddenly could not , it said unable to connect to log in servers, any way to solve this??):
Same here, NA server, windows 10 15063.483, lol patch 7.14, cannot login for several hours now, that is frustrating
yes i have the same problem
